name: AR Safari - Forest Adventure
description:
AR Safari: Animal Hunting Games is a brand new augmented reality game uplifting the safari games to a new level.

SAFARI

Start new gaming chapter and convert your table into real time jungle. This AR game has everything for safari hunting games lover. Experience the Animals in the Jungle by just immersing yourself in their world through Augmented Reality.

HUNTING

Just pick your rifle and do wild animal safari hunting to complete challenging levels of AR safari game. Just grab your phone and let the real fun begin. Move around and set the best angle to get best experience.

Features:
• Best and unique safari AR game!
• Real-time animal hunting experience!
• Amazing Animations and HD graphics!
• Easy and user friendly controls!
• Simple single touch control. Just tap and play!
